QuestData.Title: Titanic Innovation
QuestData.RewardText: Spectacular! Marvelous! At last, I understand fully, and the titans themselves speak to me! They have shown me how to use the essences to craft the finest armors the world has ever seen, though I think the results may be... somewhat unpredictable.$b$b<Vridiel beams with pride.>$b$bWell, what are you waiting for? Bring me as many Wakening Essence as you can find!
